snippet.title: Valiant Tactics EX Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Valiant Tactics EX will be free to play via STEAM® starting March 29, 2024.  

Play now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477530/VALIANT_TACTICS_EX/

COMPETITIVE REAL TIME STRATEGY AND DECKBUILDING FUSE INTO ONE!

Valiant Tactics EX offers a distinctive blend of real-time strategy and deckbuilding elements, redefining the tactics genre with a strong focus on immersive online PvP gameplay. Engage in strategic battles against players worldwide, where you'll craft your own armies and compete in the intense Battlefield of Valor. Take part in fast-paced 15-turn real-time battles to conquer the enemy's castle or defeat the opposing commander, leading your forces to victory!

Beyond the thrilling online clashes, immerse yourself into the world of Valiant Tactics EX and uncover the gripping narrative of the Marius Uprising in the Campaign mode. Collect cards, level up your army, unlock perks, and experience a captivating visual novel-inspired story. Explore the depths of tactical warfare and conquer the battlefield like never before.

LINKS:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Valiant-Tactics-EX/61556782675666/?paipv=0&eav=AfbzuodDjM8ofdTqmAUxQWJJMMX4JH82Ax0OVm2s4QQkimcQFfrCNqoQTyb-ORk1N7Q&_rdr
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/valiant_tactics_ex/?%5Cigsh=ZHdoejB5MTA3c3Jj&utm_source=qr&fbclid=IwAR0OlvNZhut_WGXhbhkuM-1bfYzBG2hZFlQBKAoTxCxIGH359jeCHuYpAn4
Twitter: https://twitter.com/VT_EX_EN
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@valiant_tactics_ex
